titles.title: Koukyuu Juutakugai ni Tadoritsuita Furyou Shounen-tachi wa Soredemo Itsumo to Kawaranai
Os Jovens Delinquëntes Que Chegaram no Luxuoso Bairro Residencial Ainda São Os Mesmos De Sempre!
The Delinquents That Arrive at the High-Class Neighborhood Are the Same as Always
高級住宅街に辿り着いた不良少年たちはそれでもいつもと変わらない
